meanings.definition: Opposition to or rejection of rituals.
meanings.sent1: Her antiritualism led her to skip the traditional ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The community's antiritualism was evident in their lack of formal celebrations.
meanings.sent3: His antiritualism was so strong that he refused to even blow out birthday candles.
meanings.sent4: The antiritualism in her family was like a bright light in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The antiritualism of the group was as clear as a cloudless sky.

meanings.definition: The belief or practice of avoiding or criticizing rituals.
meanings.sent1: Their antiritualism caused them to question every traditional practice.
meanings.sent2: The professor's antiritualism made her classes unique and thought-provoking.
meanings.sent3: His antiritualism was so strong that he created a new holiday just to avoid existing rituals.
meanings.sent4: The antiritualism of the team was a breath of fresh air in a stuffy room.
meanings.sent5: The antiritualism of the group was like a beacon in a sea of tradition.
